file_content.text: It's so nice to see young people getting involved! Warms the heart, really!
Please let Captain Alethios know when the Rist situation has been resolved.
While you were pummeling House Rist's men into giving up their satellite codes, I've been trying to track their comm chatter.
If we could get to their transceiver, you could destroy their communications network--knocking out their ability to speak, as well as see.
I'll help you.
Find a hidden transceiver?
The Rists are operating out of the houses nearby--if I'm right, you'll find the transceiver there.
Please tell Captain Alethios when the Rist transceiver is shut down. He's my nephew. Good lad. Promising career.
Not now. [Refuse quest]
Of course, of course. Do let me know if you change your mind.
The Rist satellite relay has been disabled.
I can't tell you how good it is to see young people working for the good of Alderaan!
Thank you so much, my lady. You have done a great thing for Alderaan.
Thank you, young man. It's so refreshing to see young people with an interest in public service.
You'll probably need to rough up House Rist's agents in order to get the codes to the relay. Nothing else for it.
Are you here to help? No, no. Impossible. My transmission never got through.
You're not Imperials and you don't appear to be Rist thugs. Explorers, perhaps?
What would bring a Jedi here? You can't be working for Rist. Too ridiculous a prospect to consider.
Mercenary? No, too disciplined. Soldier? Hmm, but not one of Rist's. Curious.
Hmm. You got here safely and you're not drooling on yourself. Can't be one of the Rists, then.
Well, you haven't shot me yet, so I'll assume you're friendly. I don't suppose you'd be interested in helping an old operative?
How can I help?
Well, I came here to help House Organa, but I'm not as young as I used to be.
No offense, but you're the most unlikely operative I've ever seen.
You're a spy?
I came out of retirement to help Alderaan. I'll have you know I was quite the spy back in my day.
I'll hear your plan, anyway.
House Rist has a satellite relay up in the mountains. It's central to their spy network for this region.
Disabling it will throw Rist into confusion and save the lives of countless Organa troops. But I can't get near it.
What needs to be done to take out this satellite relay?
I can take care of it.
I can't keep all these houses straight. Which one is Rist?
Who is House Rist?
They're assassins, for the most part. With a few spies. Their family reunions must be dreadful.
If you could get the command codes for the relay from House Rist's men, you could use the codes to take control.
Without the relay, those Rist miscreants won't be able to watch the area. Then the Organas could march in and send those bullies packing.
Too bad. [Refuse quest]
Young people these days....
I would be more than happy to talk to you later. Perhaps when I'm less in danger of being murdered.
